.. _`design_system_contribute`:

Contribute
==========

Typically, the documentation of design system happens in the UX team. Nevertheless, contribution to the design system is welcome. Please follow the process defined below:

#. Consult the existing documentation and avoid replication in your contribution.
#. Embed the changes in the design system.
#. If possible, initiate a review request using review board with the original author of the chapter.
#. In case of lacking code review experience, create a change request with the changes under cs.designsystem.
